definition: PRC sports and physical culture commission

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly

sentences.english: The State Physical Culture and Sports Commission has promulgated and implemented teaching and training syllabus in acrobatic gymnastics.
sentences.chinese: 全国技巧教学训练大纲已由国家体委正式颁布实施。
